snippet: Pineda pitched two and two-thirds innings against the Baltimore Orioles in Tampa, Fla., yielding three hits and a walk and striking out five.
abstract: New York Yankees continue to be optimistic about Michael Pineda; he pitches two and two-thirds innings against the Baltimore Orioles in Tampa, Fla, yielding three hits and a walk and striking out five.
lead_paragraph: Pineda pitched two and two-thirds innings against the Baltimore Orioles in Tampa, Fla., yielding three hits and a walk and striking out five.

headline.main: Yankees’ Pineda Makes Impression Against Orioles
